response.overview: The ninth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series It is said that you can see the beautifully launched fireworks from the apartment where the contributor lives. The contributor carelessly forgot that the summer fireworks display held in the local area was today, so he had no choice but to turn the camera from the apartment. Then, a creepy figure is reflected vividly in it.
response.tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 9
